00046 namespace detail {
00052     typedef boost::uintmax_t doubledigit_t;
00053 
00059     typedef boost::uint_t<std::numeric_limits<doubledigit_t>::digits / 2>::fast
00060         digit_t;
00061 
00064     const size_t        bits_per_digit    = std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00065     const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00066     const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00067     const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00068     const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);
00070 
00072     const extern std::string nan_text;
00073 
00074     struct data_t;
00075 
00077     struct token { };
00078 
00080     struct base_random_generator {
00081         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00082         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00083     };
00084 
00086     template <class T>
00087     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00088         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00089         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00090         random_generator(T *g): genobj(g), gen(*g,
00091             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00092                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00093         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00094         std::auto_ptr<T> genobj;
00095         gen_t gen;
00096     };
00097 
00099     void set_random_generator(base_random_generator *obj);
00100 
00105     unsigned int get_random();
00106 } // namespace detail

00778 template <typename T>

00784 namespace core {
00785 
00798 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00799     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00800     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00801 {
00802     if (n >= 0) {
00803         if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00804             _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00805         else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00806     } else if (n == (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()) {
00807         // Have to treat the minimum number carefully, because -n is not
00808         // what you'd think it is.
00809         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-(n+1)));
00810         _set_negative(true);
00811         --(*this);
00812     } else {
00813         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-n));
00814         _set_negative(true);
00815     }
00816 }
00817 
00830 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00831     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00832     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type*)
00833 {
00834     if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00835         _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00836     else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00837 }
00838 
00849 template <typename T>
00850 T to(const integer& n) {
00851     if (n < (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()
00852         || n > (std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())
00853             throw too_big("value out of range for requested conversion");
00854 
00855     T rval=0;
00856     size_t len=n._get_length();
00857     for (size_t x=0; x<len; ++x)
00858         rval=static_cast<T>((rval * detail::digit_overflowbit)
00859             + n._get_digit(len-x-1));
00860     if (n.sign() < 0) rval *= -1;
00861     return rval;
00862 }
00863 
00866 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00867 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00868     traits>& out, const integer& n)
00869 {
00870     int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00871         : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00872         : 10);
00873     bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00874 
00875     int nsign=n.sign();
00876     if ((out.flags() & std::ios::showpos) && nsign >= 0) out << "+";
00877 
00878     if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00879         if (nsign < 0) out << "-";
00880 
00881         if (base==16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00882         else if (base==16) out << "0x";
00883         else if (base==8) out << "0";
00884 
00885         out << to_string(abs(n), base, upperCase);
00886     } else {
00887         out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00888     }
00889     return out;
00890 }
00891 
00892 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00893 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00894     traits>& in, integer& n)
00895 {
00896     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00897     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00898     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00899     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00900 
00901     size_t base=autobase;
00902     if (count==1) {
00903         if (hex) base=16;
00904         else if (oct) base=8;
00905         else base=10;
00906     } else if (count>1) base=10;
00907     // else auto-base
00908 
00909     std::string s;
00910     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00911         in.ignore();
00912     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00913         in.ignore();
00914         s.push_back('-');
00915     }
00916 
00917     if (base==autobase) {
00918         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00919             in.ignore();
00920             int c=in.peek();
00921             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00922                 in.ignore();
00923                 base=16;
00924             } else base=8;
00925         } else base=10;
00926     }
00927 
00928     while (in) {
00929         int c=in.peek();
00930         if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00931             (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00932             (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00933                 (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00934         {
00935             in.ignore();
00936             s.push_back(char(c));
00937         } else break;
00938     }
00939 
00940     token allow=allow_exceptions();
00941     try {
00942         integer testValue=from_string(s, base);
00943         n=testValue;
00944     } catch (std::exception&) {
00945         // Catch invalid strings
00946         in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00947     }
00948 
00949     return in;
00950 }
00952

00955 namespace blockable {
00956 
00969 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00970     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00971     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00972 {
00973     try {
00974         *this=integer(core::integer(n));
00975     } catch (std::exception&) {
00976         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00977         _attach(0);
00978     }
00979 }
00980 
00993 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00994     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00995     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type*)
00996 {
00997     try {
00998         *this=integer(core::integer(n));
00999     } catch (std::exception&) {
01000         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
01001         _attach(0);
01002     }
01003 }
01004 
01009 template <typename T>
01010 T to(const integer& n) {
01011     try {
01012         return to<T>(core::integer(n));
01013     } catch (std::exception&) {
01014         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
01015         else return 0;
01016     }
01017 }
01018 
01021 template <typename charT, typename traits>
01022 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
01023     traits>& out, const integer& n)
01024 {
01025     if (n.is_nan()) {
01026         out << detail::nan_text;
01027         return out;
01028     } else {
01029         return core::operator<<(out, core::integer(n));
01030     }
01031 }
01032 
01033 template <typename charT, typename traits>
01034 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
01035     traits>& in, integer& n)
01036 {
01037     if (in.peek()=='#') {
01038         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
01039         char buffer[6];
01040         std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
01041         buffer[size]=0;
01042         std::string str(buffer);
01043 
01044         if (str==detail::nan_text) n=integer::nan();
01045         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
01046     } else {
01047         core::integer nn;
01048         core::operator>>(in, nn);
01049         if (in) n=nn;
01050     }
01051 
01052     return in;
01053 }
01055 
01056 } // namespace blockable

01059 
01060 } // namespace xint
01061 } // namespace boost
